about_the_game:
In a world where greatness is measured by the size of statues, you have the honor of building a monument worthy of your ruler! But for this, you need workers… lots of small, wild, gnome hands. Welcome to the simulator where you must build a settlement of gnome slaves.

What we offer:

  • Hunting
    Venture into the dark depths of nearby forests to capture "voluntary", wild gnomes. Use your wits, cunning, traps, homemade grenades, and other tools to aid in this.

  • Construction
    Managing gnome slaves is an art. Organize labor on the construction site, build infrastructure, monitor the gnomes’ condition and resources. Don't forget – unhappy gnomes can be not only useless but also dangerous.

  • Progress
    Turn a remote field into a grand construction complex. Upgrade technology, build workshops and camps for gnomes, and increase productivity.

  • Choice
    Can you keep the gnomes under control, or will you give them a taste of freedom? How far are you willing to go to build the monument? Your actions will shape the game and its outcome.

What we want:

Add the game to your wishlist, and together we will enslave these little, insolent creatures for our bright future!

content_descriptors.notes: The game features depictions of sexual behavior, extreme violence and blood and gore (including mutilation and torture), and imagery that some players may find disturbing.
